title: Border, 1700–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop and twist with twist return
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of asymmetric floral clusters placed in a dense pattern. Modes: bride tortillée, réseau mouché, enchainettes.
